'''Fisherman's Maintenance''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Fisherman's Maintenance is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in the underground passageway below [[Yasna Monument]].
<gallery>
Item Fisherman's Maintenance Location.png|Map location
Item Fisherman's Maintenance Context.png|Additional Context
</gallery>

First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
